attributes.action: Allow wives who stay at home to be allowed to transfer their tax benefits to their husband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to support families who wish to bring their children up without the use of child minders the tax benefits that would be given to a wife at work should be transferred to the husband whilst she is not at work.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/tax-allowance/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
